title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8450.3 - Designation of fiscal officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8450.3 - Designation of fiscal officer

State Regulations
(a) Chief Account Clerk, Division of Veterans' Affairs, Empire State Plaza, Albany, N.Y., is designated the fiscal officer, who shall certify the payroll and
respond to requests, in accordance with section
8450.6
(b) of this

Part, for an itemized record setting forth the name and address, title and
salary of every officer or employee of the agency. (b) The fiscal officer shall make the payroll
items listed above available to any person, including bona fide members of the
news media as required under paragraphs (1)(g) and (1)(i), and subdivision
(10), of section 88 of the Freedom of Information Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8450.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
